translations.translation: Arguing in it with one another, they will say,
Disputing among themselves they will say:
There they will quarrel with one another and the erring ones will say (to their deities):
And they will say, and they will be quarrelling in it:
They will say while contending therein,
They shall say while they contend therein:
They shall say, as they dispute there one with another,
And they will say, when they are quarrelling therein:
They will dispute between themselves therein, and will say,
And they, While contending therein, shall say:
They will say, as they wrangle in it [together],
They will say there in their mutual bickerings:
They will say while contending therein,
And they will say while they dispute with one another,
They will say, as they feud in it.
They will say while they dispute therein,
[26:96] They, the perverse, shall say, as they wrangle therein, with those whom they used to worship:
(And they) i.e. the disbelievers (will say, when they are quarrelling) with their deities, leaders and the offspring of Iblis (therein) in hell:

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبعدما دخلوا في النار صاغرين مهانين { قَالُواْ } أي: الداخلون في النار تابعاً ومتبوعاً { وَهُمْ فِيهَا } أي: في النار { يَخْتَصِمُونَ } [الشعراء: 96] أي: يتخاصم بعضهم بعضاً
